description: This Python module provides utilities for mapping natural language questions to Cypher database queries, specifically for a knowledge graph system. It includes a dataclass for representing Cypher queries and a rule-based class for pattern matching questions and generating corresponding Cypher queries.

classes.name: CypherQuery
classes.description: Represents a Cypher query with associated parameters.

classes.name: RuleBasedNLPMappings
classes.description: A rules engine for mapping specific natural language patterns to Cypher queries with basic pattern matching logic.

methods.name: Optional[CypherQuery] map_question(self, question: str, top_k: int = 10)
methods.description: Maps a natural language question to a CypherQuery if a supported pattern matches, using specific rules for common question templates.

ctags.name: map_question
ctags.pattern: /^    def map_question(self, question: str, top_k: int = 10) -> Optional[CypherQuery]:$/
